text:
*DYNAMIC PAGES*
I use dynamic page with HubDB so I have main page with list of elements (`dynamic_page_hubdb_table_id`)
When I'm on a single element (`dynamic_page_hubdb_row`) how can I access to page list information ? (path, name...)

I want to create a breadcrumb :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi, I am working with the HubDB API (Json) at the moment and I can't see how can I get values from a foreign_id, is it possible at all?
you have to query the other table, and look for the row id. Foreign id just stores the row id from another table.
yep but how do I merge to tables in n API query?
taking as example this API from the Docs ` <https://api.hubapi.com/hubdb/api/v2/tables?hapikey=demo> ` there is only one field for the HubDB id
you donâ€™t merge them, you make 2 calls
can you use the HTTP request variables from <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-variables>?
